example.title: Code listing: an RSS 1.0 XML file
example.programlisting: <rdf:RDF xmlns="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/"> <channel rdf:about=""> <title>Yellow Duck Framework</title> <description>News about the YDF</description> <link>http://localhost/ydf/?do=rss10</link> <dc:date>2004-05-22T13:36:11+01:00</dc:date> <items> <rdf:Seq> <rdf:li rdf:resource="http://localhost/ydf/?do=rss10#1"/> <rdf:li rdf:resource="http://localhost/ydf/?do=rss10#2"/> </rdf:Seq> </items> </channel> <item rdf:about="http://localhost/ydf/examples/?do=rss10#1"> <dc:format>text/html</dc:format> <title>Title 1</title> <link>http://localhost/ydf/feedcreator1.php?do=rss10#1</link> <description>Description 1</description> </item> <item rdf:about="http://localhost/ydf/examples/?do=rss10#2"> <dc:format>text/html</dc:format> <title>Title 2</title> <link>http://localhost/ydf/feedcreator1.php?do=rss10#2</link> <description>Description 2</description> </item> </rdf:RDF>
